summary: Experienced, passionate and highly motivated fitness professional focused on creating dynamic and positive experiences for fitness members. Well organized and reliable with excellent leadership and teamwork skills.
skills: Les Mills Programs (Body Conditioning, Spinning, Aquatics, Combat, Body Pump, CXWORX)

experience.title: Group Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Teach fitness classes for all levels; provide modifications; observe and model proper body mechanics; communicate with members to improve exercise knowledge, safety and form; motivate members to stay consistent and reach goals. Accomplishments: Group Fitness Instructor of the Year Award (2010); CanDo Stars Award.

experience.title: Group Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Led fitness classes; provided safe and effective workouts; observed and modeled proper body mechanics; motivated participants to stay fit and active.

experience.title: Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Led fitness classes for moms and babies in strollers; used body weight and resistance equipment to provide safe and effective workouts; observed and modeled good body mechanics; acted as role model for moms.

experience.title: Group Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Group Fitness Instructor duties and classes delivered for various participants.

experience.title: Pharmaceutical Sales Representative
experience.description: Managed NY territory; marketed and sold a portfolio of arthritis, asthma and osteoporosis products to doctors, surgeons and pharmacists. Conducted territory analysis to identify opportunities and threats. Served as District Champion for Singulair; communicated new bulletins and initiatives. Built strong customer relationships and consistently achieved top market shares across the NJ region. Mentored two new representatives and led health education programs for colleagues and physicians.

experience.title: Product Marketing Specialist
experience.description: Product management of Canon's Office Products Line; launched new products for major accounts; acted as Staples' Key Account Representative coordinating trainings and public events; conducted national trainings for sales personnel and Canon subsidiaries; developed marketing materials and analyzed sales data to inform strategy.

experience.title: Public Relations Representative
experience.description: Promoted computer learning school to educators across a large territory; led motivational presentations for high school classes; recruited new students; increased territory penetration and organized educational events; recognized as top performer.

experience.title: Trainer/Coach
experience.description: Coaches small group training sessions using equipment such as dumbbells, TRX suspension straps, Bosu balls, ab dollys, water rowers and treadmills. Provides safe and effective exercise modifications as needed. Motivates members to exceed expectations in a professional and engaging manner.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Communications and Spanish

certifications: Experience in developing choreography and Johnny G Certified Spinning Instructor
AEA certified Aquatics Instructor: Ball, Resistance/Strength, bootcamp, core
Certified in three Les Mills Programs (Body Conditioning, Spinning, Aquatics, and Les Mills Combat, Body Pump, CXWORX)
